import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Table, Row, Col, Menu, Card, Input, Select, Form, InputNumber, Divider, Button, Modal, Drawer, Space } from 'antd' import { DeleteOutlined, EditOutlined, FormOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { inject, observer } from 'mobx-react' import { TcrbButton, TcrbPopconfirm } from '../../antd-styles/styles' import SimpleInput from '../../simple-input' const { Option } = Select; const ManageUser = inject('userAccessManagementStore') (observer((props) => { const [viewEditUserDetail, setViewEditUserDetail] = useState(false) const [modalTitle, setModalTitle] = useState('') const [modalType, setModalType] = useState('') const [visiable, setVisiable] = useState(false) const [modalString, setModalString] = useState('') const { userAccessManagementStore } = props const [form] = Form.useForm(); const goBackToUserList = () => { userAccessManagementStore.nextPageIsManageUser = false } const FormEditUser = () => { return (
Employee ID Supervisor Name Surname Username Email Join Date {/* */} Last working date {/* */} Status Section { setViewEditUserDetail(false) }} >Cancel Submit
) } const FormShowUser = () => { return (
Employee ID {userAccessManagementStore.userSelected.employee_id} Supervisor {userAccessManagementStore.userSelected.supervisor} Name {userAccessManagementStore.userSelected.name} Surname {userAccessManagementStore.userSelected.surname} Username {userAccessManagementStore.userSelected.username} E-mail {userAccessManagementStore.userSelected.email} Status {userAccessManagementStore.userSelected.status} Section {userAccessManagementStore.userSelected.section} { setViewEditUserDetail(true) }} >Edit
) } const FormAddGroup = () => { return (

Group
) } const addGroupToUser = () => { setModalTitle('Add New Group') setModalType('confirm') setModalString( ) setVisiable(true) } const addGroup = () => { setVisiable(false) } return (
goBackToUserList()} >Back {viewEditUserDetail ? : } addGroupToUser()} >Add Group To User {/* */} addGroup()} onCancel={() => setvisible(false)} textCancel={textCancel} textOk={textOk} width={600} modalString={modalString} visible={visible} /> ) })) export default ManageUser
